      NumGlyphs = 2
    end
  end
  object qSerialCuadrilla: TQuery
    CachedUpdates = True
    DatabaseName = 'BaseDato'
    SQL.Strings = (
      'select ASM.SERIAL '
      'from alm_serialmaterial asm'
      'where ASM.CODIGOGRUPOTRABAJO=:CodigoGrupoTrabajo'
      'and ASM.CODIGOADMINISTRATIVO=:CodigoAdministrativo '
      'and ASM.CODIGOMATERIAL=:CodigoMaterial'
      'order by ASM.SERIAL')
    Left = 80
    Top = 70
    ParamData = <
      item
        DataType = ftFloat
        Name = 'Codigogrupotrabajo'
        ParamType = ptUnknown
      end
      item
        DataType = ftFloat
        Name = 'CodigoAdministrativo'
        ParamType = ptUnknown
      end
      item
        DataType = ftFloat
        Name = 'CodigoMaterial'
        ParamType = ptUnknown
      end>
    object qSerialCuadrillaSERIAL: TStringField
      FieldName = 'SERIAL'
      Origin = 'ALM_SERIALMATERIAL.SERIAL'
    end
  end
  object dsSerialCuadrilla: TDataSource
    DataSet = qSerialCuadrilla
    Left = 77
    Top = 128
  end
end
